TestGroupDocumentation.Title: enumeration2 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for validating the content of changed trees got by unmarshalling of the enumeration-2.xsd based XML documents or created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a float restricted SimpleType with enumeration values 65556.05328541E-18, 16777215.999999999999E31, 5964894.839E-9, 16777215.999999999999E-81. Various XML documents specify various values in the element.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML float enumeration-2.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls enumeration-2-4.xml document, sets valid values 5964894.839E-9, 65556.05328541E-18, 0.0 for the float restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-float-enumeration-2 element and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML float enumeration-2.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls enumeration-2-4.xml document, sets the invalid values 1.0, Float.MAX_VALUE, Float.NEGATIVE_INFINITY, Float.NaN for the float restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-float-enumeration-2 element and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML float enumeration-2.xsd, validate created content tree with valid content
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates the float restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-float-enumeration-2 element with a valid value, sets its value to 5964894.839E-9, 65556.05328541E-18, 0.0 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML float enumeration-2.xsd, validate created content tree with invalid content
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates the float restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-float-enumeration-2 element with a valid value, sets its value to 1.0, Float.MAX_VALUE, Float.NEGATIVE_INFINITY, Float.NaN then expects validation to fail.
